reportJson.addressLine: 2-61, Uppalaguptam, Uppalaguptam Mandal, Dr.B.R.Ambedkar Konaseema District

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 801 of 2026, dated 30/Jan/2026,executed by Chuttugula Satya Narayana in favour of his Wife Chuttugula Adi Lakshmi, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 141 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 2-61, comprised in survey number 961/3, situated in Uppalaguptam Village and Grama Panchyathi, Uppalaguptam Mandal within the District of Dr. B.R. Ambedkar Konaseema registered at sub-registrar office Amalapuram is bounded as follows: North by: Property of Navundru Satyanarayana South by: Property of Yapati Venkat Rao East by: Road West by: Tatched House of Chuttugulla Mangayamma

As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in survey number 961/3, bearing house number 2-61, situated in Uppalaguptam Village measuring about 141 Sq. Yds., was originally owned by Chuttugula Satya Narayana. [Ref: Deed]. 2. The aforementioned Chuttugula Satya Narayana executed a Gift Settlement Deed on 30/Jan/2026, registered as document No. 801 of 2026, before the SRO Amalapuram favour of his Wife Chuttugula Adi Lakshmi, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 141 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 2-61,comprised in survey number 961/3, situated in Uppalaguptam Village. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : The Property Demand Notice vide No 265, imprinted by the Uppalaguptam Panchayath Secretary discloses that Chuttugula Satya Narayana was demanded to clear the tax towards the property bearing house number 2-61. Note: As per demand notice if the property tax due is not paid within 15 days from the date of the demand notice, the property will be confiscated. Hence, it is, advisable to verify that the tax is paid up-to-date towards the schedule property, Further ,The attached Property Demand Notice does not discloses the period for which the property tax is paid towards house number 2-61. Hence it is advisable to verify that the tax is paid up-to-date towards the schedule property.

The Demand Notice attached discloses that Chuttugulla Satyanaraya is the taxpayer, hence, it is presumed that the mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner Chuttugulla Adilakshmi.

contentList: Document Name * Document Description * Document Date * Document Type

sections.content:
We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Chuttugulla Adilakshmi, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to the property measuring 141 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 2-61, comprised in survey number 961/3, situated in Uppalaguptam Village and Grama Panchyathi, Uppalaguptam Mandal within the District of Dr. B.R. Ambedkar Konaseema registered at sub-registrar office Amalapuram (1104).

Further, the current owner,  Chuttugulla Satya Narayana is to be added as a party to the loan structure along with the applicant Chuttugulla Adilakshmi.

Note:: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
